content.prompt: The author claims in the excerpt that antislavery rhetoric in the late eighteenth century was based on

choices.label: the belief that emancipated people would not be a presence in society
religious ideals formed during the First Great Awakening
legal precedent established during the colonial period
the concern that revolutionary conflict would spread from France to the United States

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and describe a claim and/or argument in a text-based or non-text-based source.
